name: SoManyThings
description:
A game made in a week for Prototype Studio class, at that class, we have a prompt every week, and we are asked to make a game within a week with that prompt. And that week's prompt is SELF-PORTRAIT WORST NIGHTMARE.

I am a person who has very bad memory. Forgetting things is constantly my nightmare, especially after I enter graduate shool. Therefore I made this game for you to experience the pain I feel. During the night, you can memorize everybody's name, during the day, you need to accept the quest from different people, and then deliver the quest on the specific day just like your messy schedule.

Music takes from Duke Ellington - Take the -A- Train
